Text: Grrarrr...
Hey, you two! You're okay...right?
Yes...of course we're okay...but...
My lord...um...about the reward...

Well...since that wasn't the flag, let's call it a
draw...
We'll start over again...
I guess it is what it is...
*sob* After all my hard work!

(I-It's hit them harder than I anticipated. I doubt
they're in the mood for a rematch. Let's switch
up tactics here...)

The two of you have improved so much compared to
the start! It was incredibly satisfying to watch such an
intense match.

My actual goal was to motivate both of you and
elevate your personal and competitive skills.
What?!

I think you both deserve the reward, so how about I
give it to both of you... Is that okay?
O-Of course it is! ...Epsilon, we did it!

Y-Yes! Looking back, I was able to enjoy myself
because I was up against you, Beta.
Beta and Epsilon exchange a warm handshake.

(Yes, this is it! The classic resolution where the
rivals acknowledge each other! Everyone loves
clichés—that's why they're clichés! That's right.
This is how it should be.)

So, what would you two like for your reward? Is there
anything you want to eat or any object you'd like?

...Please give me some time to think. This is the
most important decision of my life.
Um, um...
Something yummy!

Something yummy, huh? Something yummy... Hm? Which of
you just said that?
Boss man! Sorry to keep you waiting!
Hey, Delta, stop bothering Shadow.
Hmm. Not a bad place.
Of course. I put a lot of effort into it.
G-Guys?! What're you all doing here?!

We finished our missions...so we came to join in the
fun...

Boss man! I wanna play before we eat! Splash, splash,
splash!
Hey, quit messing around! Dumb dog!

Ack! Now you've gone and done it! Take this! And
this! And this!

Aaagh! Boss man, you're too strong when you mean
business!

Isn't it nice...playing at the beach with everyone
like this. Heheh.
That's good and all, but...um...my reward...
...Hm? Did something happen with the two of you?
Um... It's kind of hard to explain...

...Oh well! We might as well have fun together since
we're all here at the beach!

...Yes, I agree! It was a tie anyway! Let's have a
blast together!
Hm? Well, okay, so long as that's the case...
So...this is watermelon...

Earlier, Master Shadow taught us the wisdom of
"Watermelon Smashing."
I'm interested... Let me try...

I'm good at it too! The winner is the one who smashes
the watermelon to pieces!

I don't know the details, but I'm sure it's nothing
like that...
...Nothing beats us all being together. Right, Beta?
...Agreed. Let's cherish this time, Epsilon.

The members of the Seven Shadows have the time of
their life at the beach.

Together with Shadow, they enjoy an unexpectedly long
vacation.
Then, a few days later...
